comments:
When syncing with the repository, one file contained a lot of changes which I 
copied over to my workspace file, but also some of my own new (incompatible) 
changes. I copied over the unproblematic stuff, and right clicked in the left 
pane (my workspace file), and choose save. Then I got the following error 
message:

"An internal error has occured. Failed to execute runnable 
(java.lang.IllegalArgumentException: Invalid range argument). See error log for 
more details."

I am running the 20011219 build. Sorry if this bug report is hard to reproduce, 
but I do not have the time to try and reproduce it myself (I just hope the log 
files could be of some help).

This is the contents of the log file:

Oh, I also noted now that I had that actual file open in a Java perspective. 
However, after the crash, that window just displayed gray. Closing and
